title: 'After School Club' Design Lecture. What's the Font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106070647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aftersch_6646.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106070647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/afterscho_3509.jpg)

I scanned it into What the Font, and Futura Light Italic was the closest match, but it isn't right. Can anyone help?
author: Mr Austin
